resources.string: Espresso poured on a vanilla ice cream. Served in a cappuccino cup.
Espresso with added hot water (100-150 ml). Often served in a cappuccino cup.
An espresso with steamed milk and a little milk foam. Served in a latte glass or coffee cup.
Espresso cut with a small amount of warm milk.
A chocolate-flavored variant of a caffe latte.
An espresso with steamed milk, smoother than a cappuccino.
Espresso with a small amount of foamed milk on top.
A very short shot of espresso coffee made with less water.
Espresso with steamed milk and deep layer of foam.
Coffee mixed with Irish whiskey and sugar, topped with cream.
